Pricing & Services

Static Website

  • Layout Design & Site Development starting at $1,000
  • Website Hosting starting at free, but conditions may vary
  • 5 hours worth of site fixes and content updates per year starting at $150 a year. If projects extend the 5 hour limit, then pricing will depend on the scope and time frame of the changes.
  • Site includes: Website optimized for all browsers (Google, Firefox, Edge etc.), Mobile Friendly, basic SEO, and ADA Compliant

Content Management Systems

  • Layout Design & Site Development starting at $2,200
  • Website Hosting starting at $120 a year
  • 5 hours worth of site fixes and content updates per year starting at $250 a year. If projects extend the 5 hour limit, then pricing will depend on the scope and time frame of the changes.
  • Site includes: Website optimized for all browsers (Google, Firefox, Edge etc.), Mobile Friendly, basic SEO, and ADA Compliant

Advanced Site Development & Management

  • Layout Design & Site Development starting at $7,000
  • Website Hosting starting at $1000 a year
  • We’ll provide year long development and management plans that ensure site security, high performance, and the sites codebase is well maintained and using bleeding edge web technologies starting at $20,000 a year
  • Site includes: Website optimized for all browsers (Google, Firefox, Edge etc.), Mobile Friendly, basic SEO, Progressive Web Application features,and ADA Compliant

Cloud Based Business Suite

You have the option to pick and choose what business suite services you want.

  • Custom business email setup $100
  • File storage starting at $7 a month
  • Business software (Docs, Sheets, and Slides) free
  • Shared Calendars free
  • Custom forms $100 per form
  • Adding new employee to business suite $50 per employee
  • Any of these services requires continuous management starting at $150 a year

Business API (Application Programming Interface)

  • Initial data organization and programming starting at $5000
  • Any data migration and/or cleaning starts at $20 an hour
  • Continually development and additional features depend on the scope and time frame of the development of the features
  • All APIs are hosted as serverless functions, meaning the client pays per use. The cost of this pay per use may vary, but is often very inexpensive

Email Marketing

  • Subscription & Newsletter configuration and automatic pushing set up starting at $300
  • Any contact list migration and/or cleaning starts at $20 an hour
  • Basic e-mail template design and impelmentation starting at $25 per template
